title: Email Change
body: Well my email is old and i want to change it but its blocked. Is there enyother way? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Yup! You'll want to submit an account recovery request through the Riot Games Support portal. You can do that here:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416

Be sure to mention that you no longer have access to your old email and would like to change it to a new email. They'll provide you with instructions on how to proceed from there.

What Wuks said!  We'd like to take a look and help out individually with your case.  Reach out to our account team by filling out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  We'll reply back as soon as possible, and try to get your information updated.  Hang tight!
